resources.string: NutriBaby is an application to determine the nutritional status of babies aged 0 to 12 months.Try it now!

NutriBaby is an Android application to determine nutritional status in infants aged 0 to 12 months whose development needs to be paid attention to so that it can help parents or baby sisters to know the nutritional status of infants.attention so that it can help parents or baby sisters to find out Which there are 3 groups of nutrition based on body weight and age of the baby, namely malnutrition, good nutrition and more nutrition. 

This application is made for assessment 1 of Mobpro 1 class.
